name: Google Search Plugin
description: A Flask app that uses the Google Custom Search API to search the web and fetch the inner text of the first link in the search results.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Your Google API key. Create one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

CUSTOM_SEARCH_ENGINE_ID.description: Your Google Search Engine ID. Create one at https://cse.google.com/cse/create/new
